entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Yeah.  That would be great if only there were enough coronavirus test kits for all.  And if only we had been fully prepared ahead of time, which we might have been if Trump hadn't made cuts to the system.
